body.name: Kenmore 70929 0.9 cu. ft Small Compact 900 Watts 10 Power Settings, 12 Heating Presets, Removable Turntable, ADA Compliant Countertop Microwave, Black

features: COMPACT MICROWAVE OVEN ADA compliant 0 9 cubic feet countertop microwave oven is perfect for small office kitchens RVs and apartments
POWER AND CONVENIENCE Countertop microwave has 10 power settings at 900 watts an add 30 seconds button option and a safety lock to keep kids safe
HEATING PRESETS One Touch Auto-Cook preset programs take the guess work out of heating your favorite foods like pizza potatoes popcorn frozen vegetables beverages and dinner plates
EXPRESS COOKING With the One Touch express heating settings you can quickly start cooking for 1-6 minutes instantly
DEFROST QUICKLY Frozen foods are defrosted quickly with the Time or Weight defrost settings
LED DIGITAL DISPLAY: Easy to read touchpad display panel is illuminated with LED lighting. Features clock and timer functions
COOKS EVENLY: Removable glass turntable is included to make sure your foods are cooked evenly, and measures 11.22" in diameter
EXTERIOR DIMENSIONS: 18.3" W x 11.0" H x 14.5" D Power cord is 3.3'
body.description: Quickly heat up your favorite leftovers and frozen foods with the Kenmore 0.9 cu. feet Small Countertop Microwave. This compact countertop microwave oven is the perfect size for placing on your countertop of your small kitchen, office breakroom counter, or RV kitchen. At 900 watts of cooking power, this small, compact countertop microwave will help you cook breakfast, lunch, and dinner up in minutes!Cook your favorite foods, like leftover pizza and popcorn, confidently and never guess how much time you should heat them up at. With 6 pre-programmed Auto Cook heating presets, you’ll cook your foods quickly and evenly. The 6 presets include: pizza; frozen vegetables; beverage; popcorn; dinner plate; and potato. With the One Touch express heating settings, you can quickly start cooking for 1-6 minutes instantly. Just simply touch your desired cooking time and the microwave starts cooking. An add 30 seconds button offers a quick way to add more time to heating up foods or foods that don’t require as much heating time. Features 2 defrost options, Time and Weight, to help save you time in the kitchen. Simply select your time or weight setting and get perfectly defrosted foods. The microwave oven will beep to remind you to flip the food over so both sides are defrosted evenly.Other convenience features include an LED digital display touch pad control panel with clock, timer, and a removable glass turntable to ensure your reheated and frozen meals are cooked evenly. The turntable is recessed to help you more easily put in and take out your food. The removable turntable measures 11.22" in diameter. A safety lock also keeps little ones out of danger.Microwave is ADA compliant and provides cooking access for people of all disabilities. For a convenient, compact heating appliance, choose the Kenmore Small Countertop 900 Watts Microwave Oven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like it very much. All buttons work, not like the one I had before and returned… nice and small. Perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It will do
reviews.reviewText: This is the only microwave I could find that would fit in the space I have available, it will do, it’s small and only 900 watts, but I mainly use my microwave for reheating so it just takes a little longer then my former 1100 watt one I’ll make due. Actually after using it I am finding that it heats just as well as my 1100 watt one, so it’s turning out to be a really good little microwave!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's affordable and works for me
reviews.reviewText: I like the size because it doesn't take up too much space in the kitchen just big enough what I don't like is when you open the door the light doesn't come on and only lights up when it's working but it's no big deal I like it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Needs plenty of clearance. Okay on countertop but maybe not in other spaces likes shelves.
reviews.reviewText: A nice little microwave but be careful to allow the recommended clearance and/or add a little fan to move the air better. Our 0ld RV had a decent space for the ancient unit that came with it but not for newer microwaves with higher power. I added a small fan to solve the problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: wattage is worth the low price and looks very nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, has every feature I could want and more
reviews.reviewText: Works great, has every feature I could want and more. Bought this to replace a 900 watt Oster mwave that finally gave out after many years. I liked the old one (size, etc.) but this one has some bells and whistles that I really like. One notable plus is that I can see the food cooking much clearer than I can recall ever seeing with any microwave in past.I initially bought a 1000 watt "Magic Chef" and returned it to Walmart after only 1 day. Ordered this Kenmore on Amazon and really glad I did. Arrived 5 days earlier than quoted/estimated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good microwave except for two things
reviews.reviewText: I had the predecessor to this microwave that unfortunately lasted me around 6 years which honestly isn't a long time for microwave.But I digress.So I wanted to buy a similar one in the same color as before which was white and matched with everything else in the kitchen.Ok, Kenmore doesn't make a white one.Received this new one today and two things that kind of bother me...the clock turns off after 30 seconds to a minute which is fine I guess since my oven has a clock on it that shows 24/7. That means that a clock isn't really useful or needed so not sure why they include it.The other issue that bothers me is that the light inside the microwave doesn't turn on when you open it. The light only works when you are warming up food which is fine but the moment you open it the light is not on.I know most of us don't just sit in the kitchen in the dark warming up our food but what if I did? Now that's taken away from me.If those are power saving options then honestly that's not needed on a microwave! That appliance is using enough power temporarily that leaving an LED light all the time wouldn't match it and neither would a light when you open the microwave!WTF Kenmore?!I'm honestly going to test this out for a couple of weeks and while I already threw away the box, I can easily buy a new one big enough to send this thing back and get another brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Good Fit for my Needs
reviews.reviewText: The only thing a don't like about this Kenmore microwave is there isn't enough support at the front. The door goes all the way to the bottom of the appliance; therefore, when you open the door, the whole microwave dips down. The front supports on the bottom could have been moved a little more forward to help stabilize the microwave.
